mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(order_cart.cart_id) FROM order_cart left JOIN user_cart on user_cart.cart_id=order_cart.cart_id LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.id=user_cart.user_id WHERE `user`.id=#{id} AND order_cart.state=0

SELECT order_cart.goods_name, order_cart.goods_number, order_cart.goods_price, order_cart.state, order_cart.cart_id, xe_goods.price, xe_goods.goods_img FROM order_cart left JOIN user_cart on user_cart.cart_id=order_cart.cart_id LEFT JOIN `user` ON `user`.id=user_cart.user_id LEFT JOIN cart_products ON cart_products.cart_id=order_cart.cart_id LEFT JOIN xe_goods ON cart_products.goods_id=xe_goods.id WHERE `user`.id=#{id} AND order_cart.state=0
